## Introduction

This guide will walk you through the process of creating a ``GitHub`` account.
<!-- VS Code provides a powerful environment for coding and development across various programming languages. -->

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure you have the following:

1. An internet connection.
2. Completed Git installation and version-check.

## Steps to create a GitHub account

### 1. Type ``https://github.com`` on your browser - Safari is shown in this example.
- Click on the ``Sign up`` button!

![Sign up](images/create-github-acct/Step0.PNG)

### 2. Enter the email to be associated with your GitHub account

-  Enter your email and click ``Continue``

![Email entry](images/create-github-acct/Step1.PNG)

### 3. Enter your password for your GitHub account

-  Enter your email and click ``Continue``

![Password entry](images/create-github-acct/Step2.PNG)



## Conclusion

Congratulations! You've successfully created a GitHub account. You are now ready to create a *repo* for collecting your files and collaborate with your peer group. 

![Login page](images/create-github-acct/Step3.PNG)

For more information and documentation on GitHub, visit ``get-started`` page: [https://docs.github.com/en/get-started](https://docs.github.com/en/get-started).
